speaker: doctor
text: Let me do a brief review of systems with you. Have you had any fever, chills, or loss of appetite?

speaker: patient
text: I've had some chills and my appetite hasn't been great lately.

speaker: doctor
text: Any chest pain, shortness of breath with exertion, or swelling in your legs?

speaker: patient
text: I do cough a bit when climbing stairs, but no chest pain or swelling.

speaker: doctor
text: How about digestive issues - any nausea, vomiting, abdominal pain, constipation, or diarrhea?

speaker: doctor
text: Any muscle aches, body aches, or arthritis?

speaker: patient
text: Yes, I've been having some body aches and my knee has been bothering me - arthritis I think.

speaker: doctor
text: And finally, any skin issues like lumps, bumps, or rashes?

speaker: patient
text: I noticed a small rash on my arm about a week ago.
